jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we're building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

Duna is growing fast, and we're really excited to bring our third designer onboard, alongside Coen van Hasselt (ex-Adyen) and Joost van der Ree (ex-Uber).

"Compliance and business onboarding is notoriously complex, and the user experience is often terrible. Exceptional design is a crucial element that sets Duna apart - it's at the core of our product. That’s why we put an immense amount of effort into how our users interact with the product. We aspire to craft clean and intuitive solutions for very complex problems. I'm excited to strengthen our team and design culture with this person!" — Duco, Founder


Since your role with us will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • Build and maintain a modular design system — create a system that powers both live implementations and Figma prototypes.

  • Design complex onboarding flows — architect journeys that adapt to modular, multi-step customer needs.

  • Apply a conversion-focused mindset — measure, test, and refine every step of the user experience.

  • Prototype quickly and systematically — test ideas fast and refine based on customer feedback.

  • Collaborate with engineering — work closely with front-end and back-end teams to ensure designs translate seamlessly into production.

  • Shape our design culture — set foundations and standards that help the team scale.

What we're looking for

  • 4–6+ years of experience — designing complex products or workflows (B2B SaaS, enterprise tools, or compliance/fintech experience a plus).

  • Systems thinking — you see beyond individual screens to the long-term structure of design systems.

  • Analytical rigor — you treat interactions and journeys as testable, optimizable hypotheses.

  • Clear communicator — you document decisions, trade-offs, and learnings transparently.

  • Comfort with ambiguity — you can navigate complex system logic and still move quickly.

  • Curiosity and inspiration — you draw from diverse influences and go deeper than the obvious references.

  • Big ambitions — you want to build something that matters.


A final note before you apply: please read through our website in detail. You'll find the fundamentals there: what we believe in, how we work, and why we're building this company.

We're a remote-first, fast-moving team of builders looking for exceptional people who love to create, build, and ship. Beyond passion and grit, we highly value curiosity, authenticity and kindness.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you!

PS. We are looking to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. So even if you don't check all the boxes, we welcome your application!

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.


Since your role will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.


What you'll be doing in this role

  • Build modern, responsive UIs using React and TypeScript

  • Translate Figma designs into elegant, accessible components

  • Optimize for performance across browsers and devices

  • Own the frontend architecture and shape reusable patterns

  • Champion a high bar for code quality, testing, and user experience

  • Collaborate deeply with frontend and product design colleagues on motion, interaction, and usability


What we’re looking for

  • Collaborative, detail-oriented, and excited to shape product as well as pixels

  • A passion for problem-solving through elegant interfaces

  • Curiosity

  • Big ambitions


Nice to have
Experience with browser performance tuning or design systems is a big plus, but not a requirement.

At Duna, we look to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. We value potential, growth, and diverse perspectives. If you’re excited about the role, a builder at heart, and want to build magical products with exceptional people, we would love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Open Application
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

We're always looking for great talent at Duna. If the role you're looking for isn't listed here but excited by our mission, reach out anyway! 

No matter what your background or experience is, we encourage you to reach out. Just drop your name here, select a department and shortly describe the role your type of role. We will get in touch when the right role opens up!

Team Duna

At Duna, we are looking to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. We value potential, growth, and diverse perspectives. So even if you don't check all the boxes, we welcome your application!

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.


Since your role with us will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • Design and build backend systems that are clean, testable, and efficient

  • Architect scalable APIs and infrastructure for high-trust environments

  • Bring strong opinions on testing, quality, and long-term maintainability

  • Tackle complex product challenges with a user-first mindset

  • Shape our engineering practices and technical culture

What we're looking for

  • Systems thinking - you see beyond features to long-term system behaviour

  • Clear communicator who enjoys breaking down complexity and collaborating deeply

  • Appetite for learning and working in ambiguity

  • Curiosity

  • Big ambitions

  • Kindness

Our current stack includes Node.js + TypeScript, Event Sourcing, Express, Postgres, RabbitMQ, Kubernetes, AWS. Experience with these is a plus, but not required. We are more excited about how you approach problems and find solutions.


At Duna, we look to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. We value potential, growth, and diverse perspectives. If you’re excited about the role, a builder at heart, and want to build magical products with exceptional people, we would love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Fullstack Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

Since your role will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • Build end-to-end product features, from designing APIs to implementing polished UIs

  • Architect reliable and scalable systems across the stack

  • Collaborate closely with product and design to to turn concepts into seamless product flows

  • Maintain a strong focus on code quality, testing, and long-term maintainability

  • Contribute to our engineering practices and help shape technical culture

What we're looking for

  • Comfortable moving between different parts of the stack to solve problems

  • Clear communicator who thrives in collaborative problem-solving

  • Systems thinking - you see how product decisions ripple through the stack

  • Appetite for learning and working in ambiguity

  • Curiosity

  • Big ambitions

  • Kindness

Our current stack includes Node.js + TypeScript, React, Event Sourcing, Express, Postgres, RabbitMQ, Kubernetes, AWS. Experience with these is a plus, but not required. We are more excited about how you approach problems and find solutions.

At Duna, we look to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. We value potential, growth, and diverse perspectives. If you’re excited about the role, a builder at heart, and want to build magical products with exceptional people, we would love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Deployment Strategist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

The good news: we're now hiring our first Deployment Strategist!

"Our most important goal is to make customers magically happy — through product and people. Working so closely with our customers, you'll shape both how we serve them and what we build." — Duco, Founder

Since your role will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • Own customer outcomes end-to-end — from onboarding to expansion, ensuring customers achieve their business outcomes with Duna.

  • Bridge technical and business needs — translate customer requirements into clear technical specifications for our engineering team.

  • Embed with customers — understand their workflows, pain points, and business goals to serve as their trusted advisor.

  • Help shape product direction — be the voice of the customer in product planning and feature prioritization.

  • Drive implementation and adoption — work hands-on with customers to configure, optimize, and scale their use of Duna.

  • Build relationships at all levels — from technical teams to C-suite executives, becoming their go-to person for anything product related.

What we're looking for

  • 2–5 years of relevant experience — strategy consulting (BCG, Bain, McKinsey), investment banking, solutions engineering, or startup experience.

  • Relationship building skills — ability to map organizations, identify key stakeholders, and run structured, high-quality customer conversations while maintaining trust.

  • Systems thinking & project management — proven ability to manage complex projects, connect dots between teams, and understand the broader business.

  • Startup mindset & collaboration — excelling in fast-moving environments, proactive, collaborative energy with product/engineering/sales, and genuine love for solving customer problems.


Nice to have:

  • Technical acumen — ability to understand technical architectures.

  • Computer science, engineering, or Math degree — with basic coding ability.

  • Product management experience — previously worked as a product manager.


A final note before you apply: please read through our website in detail. You'll find the fundamentals there: what we believe in, how we work, and why we're building this company.

We're a remote-first, fast-moving team of builders looking for exceptional people who love to create, build, and ship. Beyond passion and grit, we highly value curiosity, authenticity and kindness.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you!

PS. We are looking to hire passionate people from a variety of backgrounds. So even if you don't check all the boxes, we welcome your application!

jobs.title: Working Student
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Working Student - 16 hrs/week, start date: early November

At Duna, we see the company as the second product we're building and are continually working to build a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you get to do your best work! As the only working student at Duna, you’ll be working across the company, gaining first-hand exposure to how a fast-growing startup is built. You’ll have the space to take ownership and see the direct impact of your work.

Since your role will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • People & HR – support with contracts, onboarding, and general people operations

  • Hiring – help coordinate interview processes, scheduling, and candidate communication

  • Operations - help with ongoing internal infrastructure tasks

  • Customer support - solve customer inquiries

  • Logistics - coordinate events, dinners, and off-sites

What we’re looking for

  • Ambition - intrinsically motivated to grow

  • Clear communicator who enjoys breaking down complexity and collaborating deeply

  • Appetite for learning and working in ambiguity

  • Curiosity

  • Kindness

  • Willingness to work from the Amsterdam office, available 16 hrs/wk

We value personality over background - we'd love to hear from you, regardless of your prior experience.

Questions about the role? Please reach out to careers@duna.com.
jobs.descriptionPlain:
WORKING STUDENT - 16 HRS/WEEK, START DATE: EARLY NOVEMBER

At Duna, we see the company as the second product we're building and are continually working to build a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you get to do your best work! As the only working student at Duna, you’ll be working across the company, gaining first-hand exposure to how a fast-growing startup is built. You’ll have the space to take ownership and see the direct impact of your work.

What we’re looking for

 - Kindness

 - Willingness to work from the Amsterdam office, available 16 hrs/wk

We value personality over background - we'd love to hear from you, regardless of your prior experience.

Questions about the role? Please reach out to careers@duna.com.

jobs.title: Marketing Lead
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Duna, we see the company as the second product we’re building and are continually working to create a transparent, ambitious culture. We want this to be the place where you do your best work.

Our mission is to redefine identity for the global economy. We’re backed by world-class investors including Index Ventures as well as founders and executives from companies like Stripe, Adyen, Notion, Remote, Qonto, Framer, Anthropic, Mollie, OpenAI, Goldman Sachs.

Duna is growing fast, and we're really excited to bring our first Marketing Lead onboard to help shape our brand.

"I can't wait to work side-by-side with this person! The Duna brand is on the right trajectory, but we see so many opportunities to take it to the next level. This person will have a massive impact on how the world sees us." — Duco, Co-founder

Since your role will rarely fit a job description, we only wrote a crisp overview.

What you'll be doing in this role

  • Define and own marketing strategy — across brand, product, content, PR, and events.

  • Day-to-day execution — implement and execute on the marketing strategy, down to dotting the i's and crossing the t's.

  • Craft our voice — from LinkedIn posts to press releases to website copy.

  • Create content that converts — thought leadership, customer stories, product launches.

  • Test growth channels — design experiments across paid, organic, events, and partnerships to find what works.

  • Shape our brand identity — ensure design and language reflect who we are.

What we're looking for

  • 5–9 years of experience in a hands-on marketing role at a high-growth company (B2B SaaS preferred).

  • Exceptional writer with a sharp eye for storytelling and clarity.

  • Engineering mindset — you approach marketing like product: testing, iterating, and shipping fast.

  • Strategic thinker, hands-on executor — comfortable switching between setting strategy and writing copy.

  • Curiosity & ambition — driven to learn fast, experiment, and push boundaries.

  • Collaborative energy — excited to work closely with founders, sales, and product.


A few things to note before you apply:

First, we’re not your typical tech company. We’re a remote-first, intense and fast-moving team that cares deeply about the details.

Second, if you're looking for just another job, this probably isn’t it. We're building a company that matters deeply to us, and are looking for people who bring this to life with us.

If you're excited about ownership, high standards, and speed — then you're in the right place.

Ps: Don't check all the boxes but you still think you will do great? Do reach out.
